description: Request message for creating a database group.

database_group_id.description:
This value should be 4-63 characters, and valid characters
 are /[a-z][0-9]-/.
database_group_id.title:
The ID to use for the database group, which will become the final component of
 the database group's resource name.

parent.description:
The parent resource where this database group will be created.
 Format: projects/{project}

validate_only.description: If set, validate the create request and preview the full database group response, but do not actually create it.

title: Create Database Group Request
